server package¶

Submodules¶

server.add_user module¶

class server.add_user.RegisterUser(database, server, width_window=300, height_window=400)¶

Bases: QDialog

The user registration dialog class on the server.

save_data()¶

A method for checking the correctness of entering and saving a new user to the database.

server.config_window module¶

class server.config_window.ConfigWindow(config)¶

Bases: QDialog

Settings window.

initUI()¶
open_file_dialog()¶

Handler method for opening the folder selection window.

save_server_config()¶

Method for saving settings. Checks the correctness of the entered data and if everything correct saves the ini file.

server.core module¶

class server.core.MessageProcessor(listen_addr, listen_port, database)¶

Bases: Thread

The main server class. Accepts connections, dictionaries (packets from clients), processes incoming messages. Runs as a separate thread.

authorize_user(message, sock)¶

The method that implements user authorization.

init_socket()¶

The method that initializes the socket.

port¶

A handle to the port number. Allows only ports 1023 to 65536. Trying to set an invalid port number throws an exception.

process_client_message(**kwargs)¶
process_message(message)¶

Method for sending a message to the client.

remove_client(client)¶

The client handler method with which the connection interrupted. Looks for a client and removes him from the lists and database.

run()¶

The method that the main thread loop.

service_update_lists()¶

Method that implements sending service message 205 to clients.

Bases: QMainWindow

The main window of the server.

create_users_model()¶

The method that fills the table of active users.

reg_user()¶

The method that creates the user registration window.

rem_user()¶

The method that creates the window for deleting a user.

server_config()¶

Method that creates a window with server settings.

show_statistics()¶

Method that creates a window with customer statistics.
